content: How about Nurkic’s 28/20/8/6 against Philly, which as far back as BR’s Game Finder has box scores has only been matched once, by Barkley in ‘86? Even if you relax it to 25/20/5/5 it’s just Garnett (2x) Shaq (1x) Robinson (2x) Hakeem (4x) and Barkley (1x), which is pretty heady company for Nurk.
